'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. It is located on the northernmost player-nameable island of the [[Magran's Teeth]] island chain (at the coordinates 7'30" N, 47'3" E).

==Background==
A center of worship for the [[naga]], these ancient ruins have been the home of the naga for generations. Now you can wipe them all out and claim their riches for yourself.

==Points of interest==
;Exterior
* The exterior of the mountain has to be scaled to encounter the naga - and if you're unlucky with your grenade throw, plenty of bats. The naga sorcerer drops the [[Sungrazer]]. Once he's out of the way, you can enter the temple proper.
;Temple
* The temple's divided into two major chambers. The front chamber contains the advance guard - plenty of hardened naga - and the inner, behind a firewall trap. Be sure to loot the bodies for the unique battle axe and cloak!

==Characters==
* [[Uvaala]], a naga shaman 

==Loot==
* [[Sungrazer]]: Dropped by the shaman found outdoors
* [[Rekvu's Scorched Cloak]]: Dropped by [[Uvaala]].
* [[Magran's Favor]]:  Looted from the adventurer's corpse at the stairs to the altar.
* [[Flame NƒÅga Hatchling]]: Looted from an unmarked egg on the temple altar.
